CHAT.comment: Parent's are out of the room. Baby starts to get agitated.
Father begins to sing to baby.
Baby is left alone in the garden and cries on and off.
Starts to play with a squeaky toy.
She plays and laughs with the baby.
Baby still crying and getting louder.
She laughs as Baby cries very loudly.
Baby is quiet for a while but then starts to fret again.
Mother goes out to answer the telephone.
Mother leaves the room. Baby content at first then cries.
Baby gurggles and mother imitates it.
Baby left alone for a long time and keeps crying.
